objects.text: • ICONIC FRAGRANCE • AUTHENTIC EAU DE PARFUM • MADE IN PARIS

product_details.name: CHANEL N°5: The Timeless Luxury Perfume - A Legend in Every Drop
product_details.description:
• Iconic N°5 fragrance - The world's most famous perfume
• Authentic Eau de Parfum concentration for longer-lasting scent
• Elegant glass bottle with signature minimalist design
• Complex blend of May rose, jasmine, citrus, and bourbon vanilla
• Made in Paris - guaranteed authentic CHANEL craftsmanship
• Perfect balance of floral and powdery notes
• Sophisticated crystal stopper with classic CC logo
• Long-lasting fragrance that evolves throughout the day
• Comes in the signature CHANEL packaging
• Ideal for special occasions and everyday luxury

banner_details:
This elegant banner design features a luxurious fragrance promotion, highlighted by a central **product image** encased in white with a golden-dotted circular frame. The **background** uses rich purple gradients with decorative golden orbs and lines for a sophisticated ambiance. The top portion showcases a prominent **heading** in a classic serif typeface, followed by a bold **subheading** that emphasizes timeless luxury. The **price** is placed in a radiant gold circular label beside the bottle. At the bottom, a **tagline** communicates product qualities with white serif text, and a golden **CTA button** urges immediate action. 

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Purple: `#36123D`
- Gold Gradient: `#F0D89F`, `#D4AF37`, `#B8860B`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Text Gold: `#E0C380`
- CTA Text: `#240D26`
product_color: The product image of Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum showcases a sophisticated and luxurious color palette perfect for a high-end advertisement. The bottle contains a rich golden amber hue (#D99A29), symbolizing warmth and elegance. This amber liquid is contrasted by the clear crystal bottle and cap, which shine with light gray (#D9D9D9) and soft white highlights (#F2F2F2). The label features classic black text (#000000) on a creamy white background (#F5F5F0), creating a timeless and minimalist appeal. The colors are subtly blended with light reflections enhancing the golden tones while the monochrome elements highlight its premium branding and refined simplicity.
